sentences.en: A checkpoint file either could not be found or is damaged.
sentences.cn: 检查点文件可能找不到或被损坏.

sentences.en: After the checkpoint the highway begins to climb and the landscape transforms.
sentences.cn: 过了检查站公路开始向上爬升,景色也不一样了.

sentences.en: At the checkpoint a US soldier examines the car.
sentences.cn: 士兵在检查站检查那辆车.

sentences.en: Checkpoint process is terminating due to a fatal exception.
sentences.cn: 由于严重异常错误,检查点进程将终止.

sentences.en: Checkpoint records show the bus was carrying 27 people.
sentences.cn: 道路检查站的记录显示,客车上载有27名乘客.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page to add a checkpoint or milestone.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页后,可以添加检查点或里程碑.

sentences.en: For this final checkpoint, your due diligence is the only software required.
sentences.cn: 这个最后关卡, 你是唯一尽职所需软件.

sentences.en: For twenty-nine years, Checkpoint Charlie embodied the Cold War.
sentences.cn: 29年来，查理检查站一直是冷战的象征。

sentences.en: Previous attempts at booting this system have failed at checkpoint [ mice ].
sentences.cn: 先前引导本系统的尝试已在检验点 [ mice ] 处失败.

sentences.en: Previous attempts at booting this system have failed at checkpoint [ nnnn ].
sentences.cn: 先前尝试引导此系统在检验点 [ nnnn ] 处失败.

sentences.en: The executable and checkpoint files are transfered automatically, when needed.
sentences.cn: 执行程序和检查点文件都只在需要的时候被自动传送.

sentences.en: The outbound tourists carrying cultural relics must pass through that checkpoint.
sentences.cn: 携带文物的出境旅客必须通过那个检查站.

sentences.en: They had to cross five military checkpoints.
sentences.cn: 他们得通过五个军事检查站。

sentences.en: This is only a routine checkpoint, please do not be alarmed.
sentences.cn: 这只是例行路检, 请不要担心.

sentences.en: We emphasize on the HA technique of Checkpoint Process Migration.
sentences.cn: 着重讨论了检查点和进程迁移两大高可用技术.

sentences.en: You should pass through the red checkpoint.
sentences.cn: 你应该通过那个红色检查站.

words.tran_cn: 检查（check的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_en: a place, especially on a border, where an official person examines vehicles or people
